text: X-DuckX is a French and Canadian animated television series. The program was directed by François Reczulski in 2001. It was made by Alphanim, France 3, YTV, Super Écran and Tooncan Productions, Inc.. The series has 78 episodes. The series tells the story of two wacky and dangerous ducks, Slax and Geextah. They are fans of extreme sports . In France, the series was first broadcast on France 3 in 2002 before being broadcast on Jetix (formerly Fox Kids) from 2004 to 2006. In Canada, X-DuckX was broadcast on Super Écran and YTV. title: X-DuckX
